subject: cleanup spec and drop debug package
commitMessage:
cleanup spec and drop debug package

- Install license using %license
- Do not override gloabl ARM opt flags in spec
- Remove debug sub-package, we will use debuginfo instead
- Reset permissions of files in repository

Signed-off-by: Anas Nashif <anas.nashif@intel.com>
Change-Id: I93bb575fdb6259bbf56aaa3f42968cb5ba988e69

subject: Do not install debug libraries on our own
commitMessage:
Do not install debug libraries on our own

We should be using debuginfo autogenerated by RPM instead!

Signed-off-by: Anas Nashif <anas.nashif@intel.com>
